1326: 终于还是到了这一刻么。
この時が、ついに訪れた。
The destruction has starts, natural rules are explained in a most reasonable way, civilization extinction will be the final conclusion.
毁灭的倒计时已经开始，自然法则以最合理的方式得到解释，文明的灭亡将是最后的结论。
破滅へのカウントダウンが始まり、自然の摂理は最も合理的な形で解釈をされ、最後には文明が終焉へと至る。
파멸로의 카운트다운이 시작되고, 자연의 섭리는 가장 합리적인 형태로 해석되어, 마지막에는 문명이 종언에 이르게 된다.
The countdown to destruction has begun, the laws of nature are interpreted to their logical end, and civilization will come to an end.
The countdown to destruction has begun, the laws of nature are explained in the most logical way, and the demise of civilization will be the final conclusion.
The countdown to doom begins, the natural order is interpreted in the most rational way, and finally civilization comes to an end.
Maybe such a result is the best for this dying world, but I still can't accept this answer……
或许这样的结果对于这个死寂绝望的世界来说是最好的解脱，但是我却怎么也无法接受这样的答案……
この結末は、絶望に満ちたこの世界にとって解放なのかもしれない……だが、どうしてもその答えを受け入れることができない……。
이 결말은, 절망으로 가득 찬 이 세상에 해방일지도 모른다…… 하지만, 어떻게든 그 답을 받아들일 수가 없다…….
Perhaps such a result is the best relief for this dead and desperate world, but how can I not accept such an answer ......
This ending may be liberating for this world full of despair,...... but I just can't accept the answer.
Well…seeking survival is the only thing in common among all lives, even for us it's the same.
没办法…追求生存是生命唯一的共性，就算是我们也一样。
仕方ない……生きることを望むのは、どの生命にもある欲望であり、私たちも例外ではないのだから。
어쩔 수 없어…… 살고자 하는 것은 모든 생명체가 가진 욕망이고, 우리도 예외는 아니니까.
No way...the pursuit of survival is the only commonality of life, even if we are the same.
We have no choice....... It is the desire of every life to live, and we are no exception.
"Start a link to the Stigmata space: ......"
——Because we're all selfish creatures called human beings.
——谁让我们是称为人类的自私的生物呢。
--who made us the selfish creatures called humans.
Quickly, I have to get back to .......
みんなのために……ここから出るんだ……。
Get out of here ...... for everyone. ......
みんなのことを守らないと……。

We are now in a dreamland, an illusion created by the stigamatas inside of your body.
我们身处的世界不过是一个虚幻的梦境罢了，是由你体内纠缠的数个圣痕所创造的假象。

msg
This dying Nagazora City is a cage that limites you, and the human civilization will not exist any more.
这座濒临毁灭的长空市就是束缚你的牢笼，而这个苟延残喘的人类文明也根本不复存在。
この破滅寸前の長空市は、あなたを束縛する監獄よ。そして、この人類文明もそもそも存在しない。
이 붕괴 직전의 장공시는 너를 속박하는 감옥이야. 그리고 이 인류 문명도 원래 존재하지 않는 거야.
The dying city of Nagazora is the cage that binds you, and the remnants of humanity here never existed in the first place.
This endangered city of Changkong is the cage that binds you, and this lingering human civilization simply no longer exists.
This doomed long-empty city is a prison that keeps you in bondage. And this human civilization never existed in the first place.
msg
At the moment, you are dying in reality, your body is eroded by Herrscher core, and my mission is to pull you away from Honkai!
而此时此刻，在现实层面的真正的你正濒临死亡，你的身体正遭受律者核心的侵蚀岌岌可危，而我的使命就是把你从崩坏的边缘拉回来！
今、現実世界にいるあなたは死に直面しているの。あなたの身体は、律者のコアに侵食され危険な状態にある。私の目的は、あなたを崩壊の浸蝕から助け出すこと。
지금, 현실 세계에 있는 너는 죽음을 맞이하고 있어. 네 몸은 율자의 코어에 침식당해 위험한 상태야. 내 목적은 너를 붕괴의 침식으로부터 구해내는 거야.
Right now, in the real world, you are on the verge of death. Your body is in danger of being eroded by the core of the Herrscher. My purpose is to rescue you from the Honkai's erosion.
And right now, the real you on the reality level is dying, your body is suffering from the erosion of the Ruler's core precariously, and my mission is to pull you back from the brink of collapse!
Right now, in the real world, you are facing death. Your body is in danger of being eroded by the core of the Ruler. My purpose is to rescue you from the erosion of decay.
msg
Based on my observation of this world, your awareness has combined with here, the world is a reflection of you.
以我这段时间对这个世界的观测来看，你的意识已经与这里融为一体，这个世界本身就是你身体的写照，
これまで、この世界を観測してきたけど、あなたの意識はすでにここと一つになってる。この世界自体が、あなたの身体の生き写しみたいなものなの。
지금까지 이 세계를 관측해왔지만, 당신의 의식은 이미 여기와 하나가 되어있어요. 이 세계 자체가 당신 몸의 살아있는 복사본 같은 거예요.
With my observation of this world during this time, your consciousness has become one with this place, and this world itself is a reflection of your body.
So far, I have observed this world, and your consciousness is already one with this place. This world itself is like a living copy of your body.
msg

ここは幻であり、現実でもある。この世界が崩壊に侵食され破滅する時、あなたの命もそこで終わりを迎えるの……。
이곳은 환상이면서 동시에 현실이에요. 이 세계가 붕괴에 침식되어 멸망할 때, 당신의 생명도 그곳에서 끝을 맞이할 거예요.......
Here is both the illusion and reality, when this world is destroyed by the collapse of erosion, your life will also usher in the real end ......
This place is both illusion and reality. When this world is eroded by collapse and ruined, your life will end there too. ......
